name: Relationships of the Heart Conference
content: The conference is designed to bring the body of Christ together, to learn together and to grow together. We focus on 3 topics. 1- Our Relationship with Christ 2- Our Relationship in Community 3- The Heartbeat of Jesus, Reaching Others. Included: \*Lunch served on site \*Stories \*Options to volunteer during conference \*Group Discussions \*Illustrations \*Hand Outs Nancy has lead conferences globally partnering with translators and interpreters. Most recently she traveled to Kenya. The April conference is adapted to our USA culture. Join us, as we come together and learn in relationship with one another.
